definitions.body: high, lofty, tall, e.g. tree Ez Eze 17:24, tower Is 2:15, Zep 1:16, mountain Ge 7:19, Ps 104:18, Is 40:9, Is 57:7, Ez Eze 17:22, Eze 40:2; cf. phrases [[על כל גבעה גבהה]] upon every high hill 1Ki 14:23, 2Ki 17:10, Je 2:20; [[על גבעות]] [[הגבהות]] Je 17:2; [[עַל־כָּל־הַר גׇּבׂהַּ]] Is 30:25, Je 3:6; man 1Sa 9:2; tree [[גְּבַהּ קוֹמָה]] Ez Eze 31:3; horns Da 8:3; walls De 3:5, De 28:52; gallows Es 5:14, Es 7:9; gate Je 51:58; altar Ez Eze 41:22; high things Job 41:26, Ec 12:5.

exalted in station Ez Eze 21:31; [[כִּי גׇּבׂהַּ מֵעַל גׇּבׂהַּ שׁׂמֵר]] [[וּגְבׂהִים עֲלֵיהֶם]] for high one above high one is watching, & the Most High over them Ec 5:7 so Ew Zö al., but Vrss De Now al. higher (earthly), potentates over them.
